name: 3 Seasons (Vanade [ Hamilton Hour])
description:
3 Seasons was developed by a sibling team of 3 women of colour. We wrote, programmed, produced the art/gui and composed the music for this game ourselves. Aside from programming resources + sound effects, this was a self-produced work of love! It's also our first game under our studio, Hamilton Hour. Follow us on twitter for updates on 3 Seasons and our future games!

CHARACTER PROFILES
